item.text: Then he brought me to the gate that faced toward the east.

I <st data-num="02009" class="">saw</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="03519" class="">glory</st> of the <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0935" class="">coming</st> from the <st data-num="01870 06921">east</st>;<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="06963" class="">sound</st> was like <st data-num="06963" class="">that</st> of <st data-num="07227" class="">rushing</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>,<n id="4" /> and the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="0215" class="">radiated</st><n id="5" /> his <st data-num="03519" class="">glory</st>.

<st data-num="04758 04758 0834 07200">It</st> was like the <st data-num="04758 0834">vision</st> I <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> when he<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> to <st data-num="07843" class="">destroy</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>, and the <st data-num="04758 04758 0834">vision</st> I <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="03529" class="">Kebar</st> <st data-num="05104" class="">River</st>. I <st data-num="05307" class="">threw</st> myself <st data-num="0413 06440">face</st> <st data-num="05307" class="">down</st>.
The glory of the Lord came into the temple by way of the gate that faces east.
Then a wind lifted me up and brought me to the inner court; I watched the glory of the Lord filling the temple.
I heard someone speaking to me from the temple, while the man was standing beside me.

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me: “<st data-num="01121" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, this is the <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> of my <st data-num="03678" class="">throne</st><n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> for the <st data-num="03709" class="">soles</st> of my <st data-num="07272" class="">feet</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0834 08033">where</st> I will <st data-num="07931" class="">live</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="01121" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="05769" class="">forever</st>. The <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> will <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">longer</st> <st data-num="02930" class="">profane</st> my <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st>, neither <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> nor their <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st>, by their <st data-num="02184" class="">spiritual prostitution</st> or by the <st data-num="06297" class="">pillars</st> of their <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> set up when they <st data-num="01116" class="">die</st>.<n id="3" />

When they <st data-num="05414" class="">placed</st> their <st data-num="05592" class="">threshold</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">by</st> my <st data-num="05592" class="">threshold</st> and their <st data-num="04201" class="">doorpost</st> <st data-num="0681" class="">by</st> my <st data-num="04201" class="">doorpost</st>, with only the <st data-num="07023" class="">wall</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> me and them, they <st data-num="02930" class="">profaned</st> my <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> by the <st data-num="08441 0834">abominable deeds</st> they <st data-num="06213" class="">committed</st>. So I <st data-num="0398" class="">consumed</st> them in my <st data-num="0639" class="">anger</st>.
Now they must put away their spiritual prostitution and the pillars of their kings far from me, and then I will live among them forever.
“As for you, son of man, describe the temple to the house of Israel, so that they will be ashamed of their sins and measure the pattern.

When they are ashamed of all that they have done, make known to them the design of the temple—its pattern, its exits and entrances, and its whole design—all its statutes, its entire design, and all its laws; write it all down in their sight, so that they may observe its entire design and all its statutes and do them.
“This is the law of the temple: The entire area on top of the mountain all around will be most holy. Indeed, this is the law of the temple.
“And these are the measurements of the altar: Its base is 1¾ feet high and 1¾ feet wide, and its border 9 inches on its edge. This is to be the height of the altar.

From the <st data-num="02436" class="">base</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="08481" class="">lower</st> <st data-num="05835" class="">ledge</st> is <st data-num="08147" class="">3½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st>,<n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">1¾</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st>;<n id="2" /> and from the <st data-num="06996" class="">smaller</st> <st data-num="05835" class="">ledge</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01419" class="">larger</st> <st data-num="05835" class="">ledge</st>, <st data-num="0702" class="">7</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st>,<n id="3" /> and the <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">1¾ feet</st>;

and the <st data-num="0741" class="">altar hearth</st>, <st data-num="0702" class="">7</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st>, and from the <st data-num="0741" class="">altar hearth</st> <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st> projecting <st data-num="04605" class="">upward</st>.

Now the <st data-num="0741" class="">altar hearth</st><n id="1" /> is a <st data-num="0413 0702 07253">perfect</st> <st data-num="07251" class="">square</st>, <st data-num="08147 06240">21</st> feet<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0753" class="">long</st> and <st data-num="08147 06240">21</st> feet <st data-num="07341" class="">wide</st>.
The ledge is 24½ feet long and 24½ feet wide on four sides; the border around it is 10½ inches, and its surrounding base 1¾ feet. Its steps face east.”
Then he said to me: “Son of man, this is what the Sovereign Lord says: These are the statutes of the altar: On the day it is built to offer up burnt offerings on it and to sprinkle blood on it,
you will give a young bull for a sin offering to the Levitical priests who are descended from Zadok, who approach me to minister to me, declares the Sovereign Lord.

You will <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> some of its <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">place</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st> of the altar, <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="06438" class="">corners</st> of the <st data-num="05835" class="">ledge</st>, and <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st>; you will <st data-num="02398" class="">purify</st> it and <st data-num="03722" class="">make atonement for</st> it.<n id="1" />
You will also take the bull for the sin offering, and it will be burned in the appointed place in the temple, outside the sanctuary.
“On the second day, you will offer a male goat without blemish for a sin offering. They will purify the altar just as they purified it with the bull.

When you have <st data-num="03615" class="">finished</st> <st data-num="02398" class="">purifying</st> it, you will <st data-num="07126" class="">offer</st> an <st data-num="08549" class="">unblemished</st> <st data-num="01121 01241">young</st> <st data-num="06499" class="">bull</st> and an <st data-num="08549" class="">unblemished</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="06629" class="">flock</st>.
You will present them before the Lord, and the priests will scatter salt on them and offer them up as a burnt offering to the Lord.
“For seven days you will provide every day a goat for a sin offering; a young bull and a ram from the flock, both without blemish, will be provided.

For <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> they will <st data-num="03722" class="">make atonement for</st> the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> and <st data-num="02891" class="">cleanse</st> it, so they will <st data-num="04390 03027">consecrate</st> it.<n id="1" />

When the prescribed period is over, on the eighth day and thereafter the priests will offer up on the altar your burnt offerings and your peace offerings; I will accept you, declares the Sovereign Lord.”
